mapper.select: SELECT video_id videoId, video_name videoName, video_image videoImage, video_state videoState, video_type videoType, video_info videoInfo, video_upOfUser videoUpofuser, video_UpTime videoUptime, playSum,collectSum,supportSum,comentSum FROM video WHERE video_id = #{videoId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video (video_name, video_image, video_type, video_state, video_info, video_upOfUser, video_UpTime, playSum,collectSum,supportSum,comentSum) VALUES (#{videoName},#{videoImage},#{videoType}, default,#{videoInfo},#{videoUpofuser},#{videoUptime}, #{playsum},#{collectsum},#{supportsum},#{comentsum})
mapper.update: UPDATE video SET video_name = #{videoName}, video_info = #{videoInfo}, video_image = #{videoImage} WHERE video_id = #{videoId}
